_meanings:
{@--3@} To accuse,
charge; complain or inform against,
prosecute, claim or demand (as in
a law-suit); {#na tatra vidyate#} 
{#kiMcidyatparEraBiyujyate#} <ls>Ms. 8. 183</ls>;  
{#viBAvitEkadeSena deyaM yadaBiyujyate#} <ls>V. 4. 17</ls> 
claimed, asked, or demanded; <ls>Y. 2. 9</ls>,
<ls n="Y. 2.">28</ls>, <ls n="Y. 2.">100.</ls>

{@--4@} To wish or long for,
desire, ask for, request.

{@--9@} To put to; harness;
harness repeatedly.
